title: Who was your favourite old school hip hop artist? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm just gonna name a few and their fav Album. It's impossible to pick my fav one it's like asking what's the best person on earth Big L - Lifestylez ov da Poor & dangerous -its one of the greatest Hiphop albums I ever listened too…he rapped about making it out of the ghetto but never managed to make it happen Madvillany - Madvillan (MFDOOM) -it's still consider by this date to be the best underground record and tbh it really could be. MF DOOM is such a smart lyricist.. Def one of the greatest and most creative lyricist ever NAS - illmatic -nothing much to say…a classic Honorable mentions…entire WuTang Clan
Sugar Hill Gang, but then, its because it brings back some especially fond childhood memories. Otherwise, I’m horrible at favorites, but I do like some Queen Latifah.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Farooq E Subhan
